abstract: Iran's Mizan News Agency releases video showing Siamak Namazi, Iranian-American businessman and current political prisoner, for first time since his arrest one year ago; video fuels speculation that espionage charges will be filed against him.

headline.print_headline: Video Shows Iranian-American for the First Time Since His Arrest in Tehran
headline.main: Video Shows Siamak Namazi, American Businessman Held by Iran

snippet: The video showed the first images of Mr. Namazi — who is also a citizen of Iran — since his arrest a year ago, hinting that formal charges may soon be lodged....
lead_paragraph: The video showed the first images of Mr. Namazi — who is also a citizen of Iran — since his arrest a year ago, hinting that formal charges may soon be lodged.
